==Abilities and Attacks==
''Most attack names are unofficial.''
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1      = State Shift
|desc_1      = When hit by {{Electro}} or {{Pyro}} attacks, the Stretchy Anemo Fungus will enter an Activated or Scorched state respectively, gaining enhanced attacks. A Stretchy Anemo Fungus can only undergo state shift once.
* If the Stretchy Anemo Fungus is defeated while Activated or Scorched, it may drop {{Item|Inactivated Fungal Nucleus}}, {{Item|Dormant Fungal Nucleus}}, and {{Item|Robust Fungal Nucleus}}, while the drop rates for {{Item|Fungal Spores}}, {{Item|Luminescent Pollen}}, and {{Item|Crystalline Cyst Dust}} will greatly reduce.

|name_2      = Stretch Spin
|desc_2      = Stretches itself, charges and spins its head around, dealing '''30% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
* '''Activated:''' Speed increased, cooldown reduced.
* '''Scorched:''' Speed reduced, DMG increased to '''60% ATK''', knockback increased.
|caption_2   = Normal
|file_2_2    = Stretchy Anemo Fungus Stretch Spin 2
|caption_2_2 = Activated
|file_2_3    = Stretchy Anemo Fungus Stretch Spin 3
|caption_2_3 = Scorched

|name_3      = Volley
|desc_3      = Fires up to 3 projectiles of Anemo energy at the player, each dealing '''60% ATK''' as {{Color|Anemo DMG}} on hit.
* '''Activated:''' Speed increased, up to 9 projectiles can be fired in a row.
* '''Scorched:''' Speed reduced, DMG increased to '''100% ATK''', knockback increased.
|caption_3   = Normal
|file_3_2    = Stretchy Anemo Fungus Volley 2
|caption_3_2 = Activated
|file_3_3    = Stretchy Anemo Fungus Volley 3
|caption_3_3 = Scorched
}}

===Fabulous Fungus Frenzy===
<section begin="fff skills"/>
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy       = Stretchy Anemo Fungus

|name_1      = Skill: Rising Wind
|desc_1      = Unleashes a field of rising winds that deals '''139% ATK''' as {{Color|Anemo DMG}} to nearby opponents and heals all its allies by '''7.5%''' of their Max [[HP]] every '''1.5''' seconds throughout its '''6''' seconds duration. It will also use Anemo to clear Elements applied to its party members.<br />''Paimon wants to see if other Fungi friends would bounce away if they jumped on the top of this Fungus' head, but it's too tall, so the other Fungi would struggle to get up there...''
|file_1      = Stretchy Anemo Fungus Rising Wind

|name_2      = Mournful Shot
|desc_2      = Fires off 4 wind projectiles consecutively, dealing '''33% ATK''' as {{Color|Anemo DMG}}.

|name_3      = Rushing Wind
|desc_3      = Releases a powerful wind projectile that deals '''119% ATK''' as {{Color|Anemo DMG}}.
}}<!--

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A spore organism of some intelligence. It possesses extreme adaptability.<br />This mushroom quickly absorbs nutrients through its extended column, and its umbrella-shaped cap turns where the wind's flow carries it.|[[Archive]]}}
